header.title: Account Settings
header.description: Manage your account settings and preferences.

edit.description: Please enter your full name, or a display name you are comfortable with.

avatar.description:
This is your avatar.
Click on the avatar to upload a custom one from your files.
avatar.info: An avatar is optional but strongly recommended.

validation.size: File size must be less than {{size}}.

accounts.title: Connections
accounts.description: Connect your TurboStarter Account with a third-party service to use it for login.

disconnect.disclaimer:
You are about to remove the Login Connection for {{provider}}.

After removing it, you won't be able to use {{provider}} to log into your Personal Account anymore.

Do you want to continue?

accounts.info: We only access basic profile information for secure sign-in.

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.description: Manage your active sessions and currently logged in devices.
sessions.info: You can revoke any session by clicking on the trash icon.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.description: Permanently remove your Personal Account and all of its contents from the TurboStarter platform. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
delete.disclaimer:
You are about to delete your Personal Account. 

After deleting your account, all your data will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. We will send you a confirmation link to verify this action. 

Do you want to continue?

email.subject: We're sorry to see you go
email.body: Click the button below to permanently delete your account.
email.or: Or, copy and paste this link into your browser:
email.disclaimer: If you didn't request account deletion, there's nothing to worry about, you can safely ignore this email.

confirmation.success: Confirmation link sent, check your inbox!

change.description: Enter the email address you want to use to log in. This will be used for account-related notifications.
change.success: Check your inbox to confirm your new email!
change.info: Email must be verified before it can be used.

email.subject: Change your email address
email.preview: Change your email address for TurboStarter
email.body: Did you request to change your email address? Click the button below to confirm the change.
email.or: Or, copy and paste this link into your browser:
email.disclaimer: If you didn't request to change your email address, there's nothing to worry about, you can safely ignore this email.

email.subject: Confirm your email address
email.preview: Confirm your email address for TurboStarter
email.body: One step left! Click the button below to verify your email address.
email.or: Or, copy and paste this link into your browser:
email.disclaimer: If you didn't sign up for an account, there's nothing to worry about, you can safely ignore this email.
email.sent: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox.

update.title: Update password
update.description: Change your password here. Password must contain an uppercase letter, a special character, a number and must be at least 8 characters long.
update.info: Try using a memorable phrase with mixed characters.

header.title: Update password
header.description: Enter your new password to update your account

email.subject: Reset your password
email.body: Forgot password? Click the button below to reset your password.
email.or: Or, copy and paste this link into your browser:
email.disclaimer: If you didn't request a password reset, there's nothing to worry about, you can safely ignore this email.

update.noPassword: You have no password set. Use the <bold>forgot password</bold> flow to set up a new one.

header.title: Forgot your password?
header.description: Please enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password

success.title: Success!
success.description: We've sent you an email with a link to reset your password.

require.title: Reauthenticate
require.description: This operation requires your password to continue.

passkeys.title: Passkeys
passkeys.description: Use passkeys as a secure alternative to passwords.
passkeys.info: Passkeys use biometrics or device PINs to provide stronger security.

remove.disclaimer:
You are about to remove a Passkey from your account.

After removing it, you won't be able to use it to log into your Personal Account anymore.

Do you want to continue?

twoFactor.title: Two-factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Add an additional layer of security by requiring a code sent to your email or phone number to sign in.
twoFactor.info: This is an optional (but recommended) feature and can be enabled or disabled at any time.

enable.title: Enable Two-factor Authentication
enable.description:
Once two-factor is enabled you will have to provide two methods of authentication in order to sign in into your account.

In order to enable two-factor authentication you must provide your current password below.

disable.title: Disable Two-factor Authentication
disable.description: Are you sure you want to disable two-factor authentication? Your one-time code via authenticator app (TOTP) will cease to work and your recovery codes will be invalidated.

totp.title: Authenticator App (TOTP)
totp.description: Generate codes using an app like Google Authenticator or Okta Verify.

enable.title: Enable Authenticator App
enable.description: Scan the QR code below with your preferred authenticator app. Then, enter the 6 digit code that the app provides to continue. You can also copy the secret below and paste it into your app.

backupCodes.title: Recovery Codes
backupCodes.description: Security codes when you cannot access any of your other two-factor methods.

save.title: Recovery Codes
save.description: Copy and store these recovery codes in case you lost your device.

logout.confirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
